name: Maniac GO
description: One against all .... No, this is not the dreams of a suffering teenager, it's an ordinary day in the life of our hero. To kill? Gone? Have a good time, carving the eyes of a sobbing victim? Each of his actions drags on the death penalty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 600 MHz or higher processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
